title: Prioritizing affordability while modernizing the grid, with Exelon EVP and COO Mike Innocenzo
description: On this episode of the Factor This podcast, Exelon EVP and COO Mike Innocenzo explains why affordability has become the starting point for every conversation at Exelon, and shares how the company navigates the massive costs of data center integration and EV adoption while overseeing a $38 billion capital plan
